pkgmetadata.longdescription: Probabilities for Pedigrees Given DNA Data // An interface to the core 'Familias' functions which are programmed in C++. The implementation is described in Egeland, Mostad and Olaisen (1997) doi:10.1016/S1355-0306(97)72202-0 and Simonsson and Mostad (2016) doi:10.1016/j.fsigen.2016.04.005.
